answer:
Have you checked the Influenza (Flu) Finder? It will provide you with clinics in your area. Phone numbers are provided so you can call ahead. If you continue to have problems, we recommend that you call your local health unit. You will find the number here. You may also consider providing feedback on your health authority website in their compliments and complaints section.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## Have you checked the Influenza (Flu) Finder?
It will provide you with clinics in your area.

## Phone numbers are provided so you can call ahead.

If you continue to have problems, we recommend that you call your local health unit.
You will find the number here.
You may also consider providing feedback on your health authority website in their compliments and complaints section.

## Immunization Nurse
question: who do I raise the issue with the lack of flu shots being available? I have gone 3 times over a spread of 2 weeks to get a flu shot with no results. this is costing too much time
question_variation_0: does flu shots have to be available
question_variation_1: how long after flu shot flu shot not available
question_variation_2: flu shot how many times without no results
